item.title: Covenants, Introspection, CTV and Activation Impasse
item.description: Introduction NVK: 00:01:10 As usual, nothing is happening in Bitcoin and we figured, what a great day to put people to sleep in a one to three hour podcast. We don’t know yet how it’s going to be. We actually don’t know how this is going to play out at all. I have here with me Mr. Rijndael. Hello, sir. Welcome back. Rijndael: 00:01:30 Hello. Good morning. NVK: 00:01:32 Good morning.
